alert.note: Alert for Bath; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 2:10PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Powell, southeastern Montgomery, southeastern Bath and Menifee Counties through 245 PM EST... At 209 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Virden, or near Clay City moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bean around 215 PM EST. Jeffersonville, Means, Cedar Groves, Lucky Stop, Clay Lick and Walkers Crossing around 220 PM EST. Campsites in the Indian Creek area of the Daniel Boone National Forrest, Cornwell, Rothwell, Fagan, Tabor and Hope around 225 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Frenchburg, Sudith, Mariba, Olympia Springs, Wellington, Ratlitt, Scranton, Young Springs and Denniston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
